A: 1. Jesus taught us to pray without _ (a)stopping (b)speaking (c)pausing (d)ceasing)
2. We should pray to God in _ (a)public (b)secret (c)groups (d)loudly)
3. If the answer has not come, we should keep _ (a)waiting (b)praying (c)doubting (d)giving up)
4. We should pray in faith without _ (a)doubt (b)speaking (c)stopping (d)asking)
5. Jesus taught us to pray for something _ (a)general (b)specific (c)anything (d)daily)
6. Jesus has power over all things on _ (a)heaven (b)earth (c)water (d)fire)
7. Jesus demonstrated his power over natural forces by calming the _ (a)fire (b)earthquake (c)sea (d)wind)
8. Jesus told the wind to say 'Peace be _' (a)quiet (b)still (c)calm (d)silent)
9. Jesus also demonstrated his power over natural forces by walking on the _ (a)land (b)mountain (c)sea (d)air)
10. How many people followed Jesus to the mountain to be fed_ (a)two thousand (b)three thousand (c)four thousand (d)five thousand)
11. A boy had five loaves of bread and two small _ (a)birds (b)fishes (c)lambs (d)eggs)
12. After all ate, how many full baskets of leftovers were there_ (a)ten (b)eleven (c)twelve (d)thirteen)
13. Who was healed by Jesus_ (a)Peter's Mother-in-law (b)Jairus's Daughter (c)The widow's son (d)Lazarus)
14. The paralysed man was _ by Jesus (a)raised (b)healed (c)fed (d)taught)
15. Jesus raised _ from the dead (a)Peter's Mother-in-law (b)the paralysed man (c)Jairus's Daughter (d)all people)
16. The widow's son was raised from the _ by Jesus (a)sickness (b)death (c)sleep (d)prison)
17. Jesus raised Lazarus from the _ (a)sickness (b)death (c)sleep (d)prison)
18. What chapter is the memory verse from_ (a)Matthew (b)Mark (c)Luke (d)John)
19. What verse number is the memory verse_ (a)15 (b)16 (c)17 (d)18)
20. According to the memory verse, a great _ is risen up among us (a)king (b)prophet (c)teacher (d)leader)
B: 1. Jesus taught us to pray without _________ ceasing.
2. Jesus calmed the _________ during a great storm.
3. How many loaves of bread did the boy have to feed the five thousand? _________
4. Who was one person Jesus healed? _________
5. Who was one person Jesus raised from the dead? _________
C: 1. List two ways Jesus taught us to pray.
2. Name two natural forces over which Jesus demonstrated power.
3. State the number of people Jesus fed on the mountain.
5. Name two people Jesus raised from the dead.
answers_C: Pray without ceasing, Pray to God in secret.
